name: Brawl Street
description:
Brawl Street is top down 2d shooting game with 6 levels. You need to avoid projectile and shoot enemies on your way to fight with Bosses. Level 1 is very easy and each next level become more difficult. Each boss have different health and damage. 

Instruction:  (control with keyboard)

Move with keyboard arrows.

Shoot with spacebar.

The game was supposed to go out on the phone but I decided to spend free on the website. (game buttons don't support full screen mode). Recommend to play with game portrait view.
